title: Mister Socky
description: Little Dusty was so excited the day he found the large sock monkey for sale in the thrift store.When he got Mister Socky home, there was much more to the toy than anyone suspected. Unfortunately for Dusty, Mister Socky ordered him to do some horrible things. Well into adulthood Dusty finds himself under Mister Socky's spell. Can the toy really talk or is it all in his head? If it is real, what is Mister Socky's agenda? Find out in this tale where Ted meets Chucky in the form of Mister Socky.
author: Tim  Miller
